title: Amazon KDP 2025: 10 Free Tools You MUST Use to Make Money! (No Budget Needed!)
description:
Welcome to the ultimate Amazon KDP 2025 guide for beginners and self-publishing authors! In this video, we reveal the Top 10 FREE Tools You Need to Succeed on Amazon KDP to Make Money

Whether you're just getting started or you’ve already published a few books, these tools will help you research profitable niches, generate low-competition keywords, design professional covers and interiors, and even market your books effectively — all without spending a single dollar.

If you’ve ever asked.
- How do I publish books on Amazon KDP for free?
- What are the best free keyword research tools for KDP?
- How can I make KDP book covers and interiors without Photoshop?
- What free tools help me sell more on Amazon KDP?
This video is for YOU.


Here's a quick overview of the 10 best free tools for Amazon KDP in 2025:

🟢 1. Amazon Auto-Suggest Tool
Use Amazon's own search bar to find  buyer-intent keywords  like “coloring book for kids” or “gratitude journal for women.” It's a  powerful, free keywo
